name: Machines Escape (DEMO)
description:
The game has a turn-based combat system with a choice of enemy.

Controls: mouse only. Hold mouse to walk. At the repair and update station, you need to choose the character you want to interact with.

If music is not playing, please refresh the page or allow the audio playback in the browser.

Github: https://github.com/mailwi/The-Great-Machine
